question: 'Please come in' is a/an sentence. (LDC KOZHIKODE 2003)

options: May you come to my house
Will you come to my house

Can you come to my house
answer: Can you come to my house

question: "Help me to do this work" is an example of: (LDC IDK-2013)

She stood on tip-toe: She plucked the flowers. The simple sentence of these sentences is: (VEO (KLM) 2014)
options: She stood on tip-toe and plucked flowers
Standing on tip-toe, she plucked the flowers
As soon as she stood on tip-toe she plucked flowers
While she stood on tip-toe, she plucked the flowers
answer: Standing on tip-toe, she plucked the flowers
